review: It is odd, but it seems that every Roku model operates a little differently.  It is, as a result, a little disconcerting to have to re-educate myself on it's operation every time I use it.  For your part, the order was handled expeditiously and the product is in excellent condition and performs to specifications.
author: Terrance L. Wessling "Terry"

review: This would have been a great product if both had worked. I ordered 2 but one had to be returned. The one I returned kept giving me a purple screen. It showed me the text titles and gave me voice but no visual. I tried it on Amazon, Netflix and Hulu channels and tried setting it up in 2 different homes but it wouldn't work. So, I am a half satisfied customer.

review: Replaced old roku box with the streaming stick. The R at the end of model number means Refurbished, so beware when you buy. Works great for a few dollars cheaper than new. Was a hassle to setup at first. If you have a certain security setup in your wi fi settings like WPE secure or something like that you will have some goong back and forth between wi fi and stick. I remember doing the same with a Vizio smart TV so it came to me to check settings. Help it helps.
